I have no idea where the name comes from it's just another building with classes as far as I know the hotel management peeps have classes there and the bba dept is there too.
It does however have an interesting centerpiece and a vending machine.
As for directions just go straight from the gjbc basement2 parking area (entering from the drive)instead of turning left  for the lifts
